nodes.text: The Drualkiin system was located in the Kessel sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It was situated on the super-hyperroute known as the Triellus Trade Route, which connected it to the Formos system as well as the Calaron sector's Ku'Bakai system. The Drualkiin system served as a notable transshipment point for spice, and during the Galactic Civil War, the spice-smuggling starship Ill Wind made runs through the Drualkiin and Kessel systems.

The Drualkiin system was first mentioned in The Truce at Bakura Sourcebook, a 1996 sourcebook published for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the system in grid square T-10.
